title: Lily James
summary: Lily Chloe Ninette Thomson[1] (born 5 April 1989[2]), known professionally as Lily James, is an English  actress and model. She studied acting at the Guildhall School of Music and Drama in London and began her acting career in the British television series Just William (2010). Following her role in the period drama series Downton Abbey (2012â€“2015), her film breakthrough was the title role in Cinderella (2015).
